<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Knowledge View">a16a7dca972971503c39f757f053af74</macroponent><name>attachment_1/NODE__isHidden</name><preset/><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[function evaluateProperty({api}) {
	if(api.data.get_article_details_1.articleDetails) {
		const {displayAttachments, hasAttachments} = api.data.get_article_details_1.articleDetails.articleInfo;
		return !(displayAttachments && hasAttachments);
	}
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-29 11:53:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>396a3d0e972971503c39f757f053afda</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>attachment_1/NODE__isHidden</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Magdas House" source="x_1027698_magdas_0">a70c2255972d7d103c39f757f053afe8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Magdas House">a70c2255972d7d103c39f757f053afe8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_396a3d0e972971503c39f757f053afda</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-29 11:53:21</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
